thread.section_title: NUO Hotel Beijing - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (China) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Elegance and luxury at its finest
thread.title_full: Elegance and luxury at its finest - Review of NUO Hotel Beijing, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: Cathy S
title: Elegance and luxury at its finest
text: Bio hotel Beijing was no less than amazing. It was stunning, spotless, and comfortable. The staff spoke excellent English, supremely helpful and most accommodating. We were traveling with 2 small children and everything was wonderful. The breakfast buffet was beyond words. Five stars all around. I will certainly be back.
